address2: Unit 9-3 No. 685, Jalan Damansara Taman Tun Dr. Ismail
longBusinessSummary: Kairous Acquisition Corp. Limited does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company intends to focus on opportunities in Asia, excluding China. Kairous Acquisition Corp. Limited was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
